Articles.Content:
This guide will teach you how to fly rockets, do interplanetary maneuvers, install mods, dock, and even make VTOL SSTOs.

-From video description.

There's lots of KSP tutorials around, but I wanted to do something different. Instead of making a single tutorial for building rockets in the VAB, then another one for launching them, then another for putting them into orbit, I decided I would make one, 15-minute-ish tutorial that covered pretty much everything you'd ever need to know about KSP. I would do lots of cuts and editing to make it short, and full of information. I even made an animated infographic explaining how asparagus staging works, and some complex editing to show how ships in different orbits move relative to each other over time. This guide is the finished result. I hope you find it helpful!

Below are the time codes for all the different topics covered in the video.

0:20 - VAB construction basics

1:22 - How to fly into orbit and return

3:12 - Landing on Minmus and returning

6:01 - Flying to a moon of Jool and returning

7:10 - Installing mods

8:43 - Docking

10:17 - Returning to Kerbin from Jool

11:04 - Building and flying a VTOL SSTO

Edited August 5, 2014 by Andrew Hansen
